#summary This page describes how to install PWision.

= Introduction =

Installing PWision is easy: just follow the steps bellow!

= Requirements=
 * a web server with PHP module
 * a SQL server

= Steps =
  # get PWision using svn checkout or by downloading a release.
  # copy files from trunk/ into the webserver directory
  # create a database on the SQL server
  # run the script SQL/initDB.mysql on the SQL server
  # edit StartDBConnection.inc with the SQL server username, password, server url and database name
